data.text: @MediaCouncilUg @lindahNabusayi God will never abandon us in times of grief. He always provides us with love and hope. He will wipe away every tear from their eyes, and death shall be no more, neither shall there be mourning, nor crying, nor pain anymore, for the former things have passed away, in the new earth

@MediaCouncilUg @lindahNabusayi The Holy Spirit says, blessed are the dead who die in the Lord, that they may rest from their labour, for their good deeds will follow them. So, if we live, we live in the Lord, and if we die, we die for the Lord. So, if we live or die, we belong to God to inherit the new earth.
@MediaCouncilUg May his soul rest in peace
